Title: Boris Without Béatrice
Actors: James Hyndman, Simone-Élise Girard, Denis Lavant, Isolda Dychauk
Plot: The life of wealthy businessman Boris takes a turn when his wife Beatrice, a high-profile politician, falls into a deep depression. After a mysterious stranger accuses him of being responsible for her condition, he re-evaluates his life choices and tries to become a better husband, father and son.
